sztejkat.abstractfmt.util

Class CBoundAppendable

  • java.lang.Object
    • sztejkat.abstractfmt.util.CBoundAppendable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.CharSequence

    public class CBoundAppendable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.CharSequence
    A string-builder like class which implements Appendable contract which throws EFormatBoundaryExceeded if an attempt is made to put too many data into it.

    This class may be used when You do not trust the char processing stream routines to trully obey string size limits.
